商品名稱: WIHOLL 女款網眼薄紗上衣性感圓領夏季寬鬆合身派對俱樂部裝襯衫
SKU: 顏色: A-1 黑色尺寸: X-Large
留言內容: I love the look/feel of this top. It's simple but does the job.Between the listing & other reviews, I'm usually a standard size L but I sized up to an XL since mesh has a tendency to create 'sausage rolls' when too tight, and I'm glad I did. It had a bit of room, but as the photo shows it still looks "fitted" (although I had some room all around, I would not say it was in anyway 'loose' or oversized). So depending on how you like your look/feel, I would recommend sizing up for a slim fit.

留言內容: I will be buying this top in every color after I finish writing this review! Not only is it super flattering even for larger chested folks, the material is stretchy and surprisingly soft. I'm re-living my punk/skater/goth days and I'm so happy about that. 🩶

留言內容: These sheer mesh tops are one of my favorites in my closet. They can be as sexy or modest as you wish by changing up the undergarment. Want to be sexy? Wear it with a bra. Want to be modest?
